solution_line_template: The shortest wave was {surfboard_length} + {shortest_wave_more_than_surfboard} = <<{surfboard_length}+{shortest_wave_more_than_surfboard}={shortest_wave_height}>>{shortest_wave_height} feet tall.

Thus, the highest wave Austin caught was {austin_height} * {highest_wave_multiplier} + {highest_wave_more_than_4x} = {austin_height} * {highest_wave_multiplier} + {highest_wave_more_than_4x} = <<{austin_height}*{highest_wave_multiplier}+{highest_wave_more_than_4x}={highest_wave_height}>>{highest_wave_height} feet tall.
